activities: Hiperos,LLC is a Software as a Service company that our customers contract with us to use. Customers either log into our system or access our website and may enter personal information into our system via their accounts maintained by our system that is located in the US. Potential customers may also access our web site and enter what might be personal information for the purposes of gaining access to our marketing material or asking to be contacted for sales meetings.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Data collected directly on the Internet and any digital data processed may be data entered by the customer user of the Hiperos application.
recoursemech: TRUSTe based private sector developed dispute resolution mechanisms that incorporate the Safe Harbor framework.
